observation: Navigating to https://csmi.com/ returned status code 200

Integrated Logistics Support & Professional Services - CSMI  Home Services Technologies Quality Management Team Careers Contact Us Select Page CSMI –  Management Solutions CSMI is a Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Small Business (SDVOSB) established in 2002 in the Aerospace and Defense sector to develop management solutions and provide regional capability in support of the defense and security of critical infrastructure. We provide program management, technical services and integrated logistics support (ILS) for Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Cyber, Intelligence Surveillance and Reconnaissance (C5ISR), Antiterrorism Force Protection (ATFP), Asset Protection and related technologies. CSMI’s deep background in the development and management of customer programs is shaped by decades of experience which enables us to provide our US and Allied Nation partners with comprehensive solutions for technology program development, implementation and lifecycle support.  We place emphasis on planning and operational solutions, workforce development, rapid integration, training, and long term sustainment worldwide.
